summary: DOD relies on a global network of suppliers to help meet its mission goals. This can mean contracting with U.S. companies that have accepted foreign investment or sent their operations offshore. We convened a panel of experts who identified some benefits of DOD doing business with these companies—including saving money and increasing access to innovative technologies. title: Defense Supplier Base: Challenges and Policy Considerations Regarding Offshoring and Foreign Investment Risks
